name: blob (itch) (uncoolanduncouth)
description:
This is a simple walking simulator created in GB Studio. It is meant to be a demonstration of how GBS can be used to make bitsy-style games with fewer limitations.

Credits:

Art - uncoolanduncouth

Music - vince94

End-screen music is totally not a Kano song

GitHub Link: https://github.com/trwiley/blob
